Author: aetolica
Text: My MIL does that!  She offers me a size XL when I wear a medium...or says something mean like, "Would you like this sweater?  It doesn't fit me.  It's an L but it runs large.  I think you'll like it."  And she knows about my eating disorder!  I think it's because my MIL has got eating issues of her own (like, obsessed with weight watchers and she lives on candy).  I have started just saying "thanks" with a sweet smile and throwing the item into the donation bag at the next opportunity.  Not going to let it get to me!
